fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article said “almost a quarter of students in British universities are now from China”. That figure, from 2014, was for postgraduate students at English institutions (What are our universities for? Taxpayers have a right to know, 31 May, page 3, Journal). • Jill Black is a justice of the supreme court, not of the court of appeal as our Birthdays column implied (1 June, page 9, Journal). • Other recently corrected articles include: Tsipras faces fight to stay in power after EU elections mauling Tories ditch ‘ineffective’ three-year benefit sanctions John Tidmarsh obituary
